item.description:
Hello Fellow Writers,

Kate and Sushrut have volunteered to post writing for this week's meetup. Please look for their postings under our files. We haven't discussed a topic for this meetup yet, but if there are any changes I will notify you all as soon as possible.

Keep writing,

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: will be in the cafe area (will try to sit towards the back)
item.name: March Madness Meetup (which incidentally has nothing to do with basketball)
